ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
glib:
- '2'
libcurl:
- '8'
libxml2_devel:
- '2.15'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zlib:
- '1'

about.description:
AppStream makes machine-readable software metadata
easily accessible. It is a foundational block for
modern Linux software centers, offering a seamless
way to retrieve information about available software,
no matter the repository it is contained in. It can
provide data about available applications as well as
available firmware, drivers, fonts and other components.
This project is part of freedesktop.org.
about.summary: Tools and libraries to work with AppStream metadata

build.script:
NATIVE_FILE_ARGS=""
if [[ "${CONDA_BUILD_CROSS_COMPILATION:-0}" == "1" ]]; then
    mkdir -p $SRC_DIR/native_pkgconfig
    cp $BUILD_PREFIX/lib/pkgconfig/appstream.pc $SRC_DIR/native_pkgconfig/
    cat <<EOF > $SRC_DIR/meson_native_file.txt
[built-in options]
pkg_config_path = ['$SRC_DIR/native_pkgconfig']
EOF
    NATIVE_FILE_ARGS="--native-file=$SRC_DIR/meson_native_file.txt"
    for tool in glib-mkenums glib-genmarshal; do
        cp -f ${BUILD_PREFIX}/bin/${tool} ${PREFIX}/bin/${tool}
    done
    echo '#!/bin/bash' > ${PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources
    echo "exec ${BUILD_PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources \"\$@\"" >> ${PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources
    chmod +x ${PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources
fi
meson setup ${MESON_ARGS} \
    ${NATIVE_FILE_ARGS} \
    --prefix=$PREFIX \
    --default-library=shared \
    --wrap-mode=nofallback \
    -Dc_args="-D_GNU_SOURCE" \
    -Dgir=false \
    -Ddocs=false \
    -Dapidocs=false \
    -Dman=false \
    -Dvapi=false \
    -Dsystemd=false \
    -Dstemming=false \
    builddir
ninja -v -C builddir -j ${CPU_COUNT}
ninja -C builddir install -j ${CPU_COUNT}

raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: AppStream
  version: "1.1.1"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://www.freedesktop.org/software/${{ name|lower }}/releases/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.xz
  sha256: 3b9d325074ede328eed4746d0c4fbfc3b8f6f4fdbc9c173ed70e40569a79b117

build:
  number: 2
  skip:
    - win
  script: |
    NATIVE_FILE_ARGS=""
    if [[ "${CONDA_BUILD_CROSS_COMPILATION:-0}" == "1" ]]; then
        mkdir -p $SRC_DIR/native_pkgconfig
        cp $BUILD_PREFIX/lib/pkgconfig/appstream.pc $SRC_DIR/native_pkgconfig/
        cat <<EOF > $SRC_DIR/meson_native_file.txt
    [built-in options]
    pkg_config_path = ['$SRC_DIR/native_pkgconfig']
    EOF
        NATIVE_FILE_ARGS="--native-file=$SRC_DIR/meson_native_file.txt"
        for tool in glib-mkenums glib-genmarshal; do
            cp -f ${BUILD_PREFIX}/bin/${tool} ${PREFIX}/bin/${tool}
        done
        echo '#!/bin/bash' > ${PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources
        echo "exec ${BUILD_PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources \"\$@\"" >> ${PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources
        chmod +x ${PREFIX}/bin/glib-compile-resources
    fi
    meson setup ${MESON_ARGS} \
        ${NATIVE_FILE_ARGS} \
        --prefix=$PREFIX \
        --default-library=shared \
        --wrap-mode=nofallback \
        -Dc_args="-D_GNU_SOURCE" \
        -Dgir=false \
        -Ddocs=false \
        -Dapidocs=false \
        -Dman=false \
        -Dvapi=false \
        -Dsystemd=false \
        -Dstemming=false \
        builddir
    ninja -v -C builddir -j ${CPU_COUNT}
    ninja -C builddir install -j ${CPU_COUNT}

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - meson >=0.62.0
    - ninja
    - pkg-config
    - gobject-introspection
    - python
    - glib
    - gperf
    - gettext
    - itstool
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: appstream
  host:
    - glib
    - glib >=2.58
    - libxml2-devel
    - zlib
    - libcurl
    - libfyaml
    - libxmlb
    - gobject-introspection
    - python
  run:
    - python
  run_exports:
    - ${{ pin_subpackage('appstream', upper_bound='x.x') }}

tests:
  - package_contents:
      files:
        - lib/pkgconfig/appstream.pc
        - bin/appstreamcli
      lib:
        - appstream

about:
  homepage: https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Distributions/AppStream/
  summary: 'Tools and libraries to work with AppStream metadata'
  description: |
    AppStream makes machine-readable software metadata
    easily accessible. It is a foundational block for
    modern Linux software centers, offering a seamless
    way to retrieve information about available software,
    no matter the repository it is contained in. It can
    provide data about available applications as well as
    available firmware, drivers, fonts and other components.
    This project is part of freedesktop.org.
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_file: COPYING
  documentation: https://www.freedesktop.org/software/appstream/docs/
  repository: https://github.com/ximion/appstream

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - danyeaw
    - ryanvolz
